adjective.description: Of, belonging to, or relating to Raków, especially to the Socinians (Polish Brethren) based there in the late 16th and early 17th cent.

noun.description: An adherent of the teachings of the Socinians at Raków; a heretic.

origin: Mid 17th century. From Racoviae, name in post-classical Latin of Raków, a settlement in southern Poland + -an; compare -ian.
